mapper.select:
SELECT corInfo.id, corInfo.corporate_name, corInfo.review_status, corInfo.legal_entity, corInfo.summary, corInfo.certificate_for_uniform_social_credit_code, attach1.path AS path1, attach2.path AS path2, attach3.path AS path3, attach4.path AS path4, attach5.path AS path5
FROM em_corporate_information AS corInfo LEFT JOIN em_attachment AS attach1 ON corInfo.business_license = attach1.id LEFT JOIN em_attachment AS attach2 ON corInfo.legal_entity_identity_card_img_positive = attach2.id LEFT JOIN em_attachment AS attach3 ON corInfo.legal_entity_identity_card_img_rear = attach3.id LEFT JOIN em_attachment AS attach4 ON corInfo.contact_person_identity_card_img_positive = attach4.id LEFT JOIN em_attachment AS attach5 ON corInfo.contact_person_identity_card_img_rear = attach5.id WHERE corInfo.id=#{id}
SELECT * FROM em_corporate_information AS corInfo ORDER BY corInfo.create_time DESC
mapper.delete: delete information,account,attachment from em_corporate_information as information left join em_corporate_user_account as account on information.id = account.corporate_id left join em_attachment as attachment on information.business_license = attachment.id or information.contact_person_identity_card_img_rear = attachment.id or information.contact_person_identity_card_img_positive = attachment.id or information.legal_entity_identity_card_img_rear = attachment.id or information.legal_entity_identity_card_img_positive = attachment.id where information.id = #{id}
mapper.select: select attachment.path from em_corporate_information information left join em_attachment attachment on information.business_license = attachment.id or information.contact_person_identity_card_img_rear = attachment.id or information.contact_person_identity_card_img_positive = attachment.id or information.legal_entity_identity_card_img_rear = attachment.id or information.legal_entity_identity_card_img_positive = attachment.id where information.id = #{id}
